sqlMap.select: SELECT sq.* FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REQUEST_TIME,'%Y%m%d') AS REQUEST_DAY, COUNT(*) AS RCOUNT FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(REQUEST_TIME,'%Y%m%d') ORDER BY REQUEST_TIME DESC LIMIT 0, 10 ) sq ORDER BY sq.REQUEST_DAY ASC
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REQUEST_TIME,'%H') AS REQUEST_HOURS, COUNT(*) AS HCOUNT FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(REQUEST_TIME,'%H') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(REQUEST_TIME,'%H') ASC
SELECT ipc.* FROM( SELECT REQUEST_IP, IP_ADDRESS, COUNT(*) AS ICOUNT FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST GROUP BY IP_ADDRESS, REQUEST_IP ) ipc WHERE ipc.ICOUNT > 20 ORDER BY ipc.ICOUNT DESC

SELECT ipc.* FROM( SELECT IP_REGION, COUNT(*) AS CCOUNT FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST WHERE IP_COUNTRY = '中国' OR IP_ADDRESS LIKE '%台湾%' OR IP_ADDRESS LIKE '%香港%' OR IP_ADDRESS LIKE '%澳门%' GROUP BY IP_REGION ) ipc ORDER BY ipc.CCOUNT DESC, IP_REGION

SELECT ipc.* FROM( SELECT IP_COUNTRY, COUNT(*) AS UCCOUNT FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST WHERE IP_COUNTRY != '中国' AND IP_ADDRESS NOT LIKE '%台湾%' AND IP_ADDRESS NOT LIKE '%香港%' AND IP_ADDRESS NOT LIKE '%澳门%' GROUP BY IP_COUNTRY ) ipc ORDER BY ipc.UCCOUNT DESC, IP_COUNTRY

SELECT * FROM( SELECT '境外' AS jnw, IFNULL(SUM(ipc.UCCOUNT), 0) REQUESTSUM FROM( SELECT IP_ADDRESS, COUNT(*) AS UCCOUNT FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST WHERE IP_ADDRESS NOT LIKE '%中国%' AND IP_ADDRESS NOT LIKE '%台湾%' AND IP_ADDRESS NOT LIKE '%香港%' AND IP_ADDRESS NOT LIKE '%澳门%' GROUP BY IP_ADDRESS ) ipc ) uc
UNION ALL
( SELECT '境内' AS jnw, IFNULL(SUM(ipc.CCOUNT), 0) REQUESTSUM FROM( SELECT IP_ADDRESS, COUNT(*) AS CCOUNT FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST WHERE IP_ADDRESS LIKE '%中国%' OR IP_ADDRESS LIKE '%台湾%' OR IP_ADDRESS LIKE '%香港%' OR IP_ADDRESS LIKE '%澳门%' GROUP BY IP_ADDRESS ) ipc )
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SOCIAL_TYPE, COUNT(*) AS SCOUNT FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST GROUP BY SOCIAL_TYPE ) sr ORDER BY sr.SCOUNT DESC
